main event: A civilian observed an orange-red flash in the sky, which appeared like a very small airplane, in Bakersfield, California on 9 March 1948.
interesting points: The object was viewed for about 1-2 seconds,The observation described the object as zig-zagging and emitting considerable black smoke,Ineffective searches were conducted for the reported objects without success,The sighting involved multiple informants including a dentist and a secretary,The object's disappearance was noted without any explosion or unusual event thereafter.
sighted object: orange-red flash resembling a very small airplane
witness description: A dentist and a secretary observing from the 5th floor of a business building.
